/usr/local/cuda-12.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -lineinfo -g --generate-code=arch=compute_90,code=[compute_90,sm_90] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/myEVD.dir/deviceObjects1 -o CMakeFiles/myEVD.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/myEVD.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp
